name: Dogey Wars 2.0
description:
Dogey wars is a fun 2D multiplayer game, You can play as dank memes and shoot other stuff. There are a lot of weapons and gadgets to choose from.

The game features a progression system, When you kill an enemy you get XP and can level up. Which unlocks new weapons! Really fun with friends, try it out :)

You can also check out my website here!
